name: merman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an imaginary creature described in stories, with the upper body of a man and the tail of a fish: According to legend, giant squid were once thought to be mermen. She read the tale of a merman caught in a fisherman's net. Compare
mermaid
More examplesFewer examplesThere was a girl wearing angel wings and a boy in a merman's costume.The aquatic imagery includes flotsam and jetsam, fish, mermaids and mermen.In the story, the young wizard has to battle dragons and mermen. No one believed his outlandish claim that he had once caught a merman in the South China Seas.
